data.title: bd-3m9, bd-1bi: workspace UX improvements
data.description:
Two workspace UX improvements:

## bd-3m9: Trailing slash on workspace paths
- All `Path:` outputs now include trailing `/` for easier copy-paste
- Affects: `ws create`, `ws attach`, `ws list --verbose`, `ws prune`

## bd-1bi: Stale workspace detection in `maw ws jj`
- Checks for stale workspace before running jj commands
- Prints clear warning with fix command (`maw ws sync`)
- Doesn't block execution, just warns

Both changes improve agent experience when working with workspaces.
